alert.note: Alert for Eddy; Griggs; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 12:07PM CST until March 01 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. There may be large snowfall gradients across counties. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Norman County. In North Dakota, Eddy, Griggs, Steele and Traill Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Falling snow and blowing snow may significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Uncertainty exists on how far north the snow will reach within the advisory area. The heaviest rates of snowfall will be tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
